sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function LanguageDrop(props) { var mapping = { "C++17" : "c17", "C++14" : "c14", "C" : "c", "Python3" : "p3", "Python2" : "p2", "Java" : "java", "JavaScript" : "javascript" } const LangHelper = (e) => { const newId = mapping[e.target.text]; const currId = props.language; props.setLanguage(newId); document.getElementById(newId).className = "" } return (
props.dispatch(e.target.text)} > C++17 C++14 C Python3 Python2 Java
); } export default LanguageDrop;
